feed.title: Montreal River Harbour - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Montreal River Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:19 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Montreal River Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:22 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 18 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of ice pellets mixed with snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of ice pellets mixed with light snow beginning this evening then changing to freezing rain after midnight. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain mixed with freezing rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to periods of rain mixed with freezing rain in the morning. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 in the morning. High 10. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Windy. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
